snippet: Michael Feinstein hosted a Jazz at Lincoln Center program that explored how popular standards have been torn apart and remade as jazz.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews Jazz at Lincoln Center concert Sweet & Low Down: How Popular Standards Became Jazz Classics at the Allen Room.
lead_paragraph: Michael Feinstein hosted a Jazz at Lincoln Center program that explored how popular standards have been torn apart and remade as jazz.

headline.seo: Feinstein Hosts ‘Sweet & Low Down’ at the Allen Room
headline.main: Crooning and Swinging in a Night of Reinvention
headline.print_headline: Crooning and Swinging In a Night of Reinvention
